subject: Ask some questions about source code of JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi, ¡¡¡¡I am reading code of JUnit, but I don t understand somewhere. Can anyone help me? Thanks a lot. 1, why to design the interface Protectable? To
messageBody:
Hi,

　　I am reading code of JUnit, but I don't understand somewhere. Can anyone help me? Thanks a lot.

1, why to design the interface Protectable? To process the Errors and Exceptions? But why not call runBare() directly in a try block(in the method run() of TestResult)?
2, what is the use of the interface TestRunListener? I can only find the constants in it called, but the methods implemented in BaseTestRunner is abstract and have no code, they are just left to be extended?
3, the constuctor of TestSuite, TestSuit(Class), can only use TestCase class (or its subclass) as parameter, then what if I want to use other extended class?


Regards!

Fei Don 2004-04-13
dongsquare@...
